member.name: MF_CAPTURE_ENGINE_DEVICE_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies a type of capture device.

member.name: MF_CAPTURE_ENGINE_DEVICE_TYPE.MF_CAPTURE_ENGINE_DEVICE_TYPE_AUDIO
member.summary: An audio capture device, such as a microphone.

member.name: MF_CAPTURE_ENGINE_DEVICE_TYPE.MF_CAPTURE_ENGINE_DEVICE_TYPE_VIDEO
member.summary: A video capture device, such as a webcam.
